SecurityCode.CODE: Base representation of what you're entering

Handprint.Info: Press and hold on handprint to scan

SecurityQuestion.Title: SECURITY QUESTION VERIFICATION
SecurityQuestion.Label: What is your top secret security question?
SecurityQuestion.Timeout: If this was really you, you would know the answer.\nYou don't need a question.

RetinaScan.Title: RETINA SCAN VERIFICATION
RetinaScan.Info: Please look directly at the scanner\nDo not move during scan process

SnakeGame.Info: Collect 4 apples to open exit\nControls: Arrrows

TypingTest.Title: TYPING VERIFICATION TEST
TypingTest.Info: Type the following text to continue

VoiceRecognition.Info: Please speak into the microphone\nVoice pattern verification in progress...

NetworkSettingsWidget.Title: Network Connection
NetworkSettingsWidget.Info: Configure network connection parameters.\nPlease be aware that the changes made here may affect the correct operation of the application.
NetworkSettingsWidget.ServerAddressInfo: Leave unchanged unless using a custom server.
NetworkSettingsWidget.ServerPortInfo: Mainly for debugging. Default server ignores this if address is unchanged.

ShortcutSettingsWidget.Title: Keyboard Shortcuts
ShortcutSettingsWidget.Info: Customize the keyboard shortcuts for various actions.\nChanges will take effect after restarting the application.
ShortcutSettingsWidget.RestoreDefaultMessage: Are you sure you want to restore all keyboard shortcuts to their default values?\nThis action cannot be undone immediately.
ShortcutSettingsWidget.RestoreDefaultSuccessMessage: Default shortcuts have been restored successfully.

WavelengthSettingsWidget.Title: Wavelength Preferences
WavelengthSettingsWidget.Info: Configure frequency preferences.\nDo you have some idea for some other settings? Open issue on GitHub!
WavelengthSettingsWidget.InvalidInput: Invalid Input!\nPlease enter a valid frequency between 130Hz and 180MHz.

SettingsView.ClassifiedSubtitle: Authorization required to access classified settings.\nMultiple security layers will be enforced.
SettingsView.ClassifiedUnlockedSubtitle: You have bypassed all security layers.\nThe true potential is now available.
SettingsView.ElevationFailedMessage: Could not request administrator privileges.\nThe override sequence cannot start.
SettingsView.RestoreDefaultsMessage: Are you sure you want to restore all settings to default values?\nThis includes appearance colors and network settings.
SettingsView.RestoreDefaultsSuccessMessage: Settings have been restored to their default values successfully.
